title: Zodiac Aligned
description: My true mate wants me back—and I need his help to free the Zodiac Wolves.After being rejected by the man I love, I find myself packless once more. Kaden says he'll do whatever it takes to win me back, though I'm not sure I can forgive him.But to save the Zodiac Wolves, we'll need to work together to uncover the truth about the mating bonds and the sinister magic that controls our lives.As the final battle draws near, new enemies and unexpected allies emerge from the shadows—but the hardest fight of all might be uniting the thirteeen packs.I'm Ayla Beros. I'm a Zodiac Wolf. And I won't stop until every shifter is free.Zodiac Aligned is the final book in the bestselling Zodiac Wolves series.
author: Elizabeth Briggs
